TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but everytime it meeps it causes a singularity to swallow a part of the Earth. Also, it meeps all the time and you can't sleep.

I wish that the next poster's wish comes true.

Granted: i wish that you never existed......paradox

I wish for a gene that would grant me infallible wishes.

Granted. Said gene renders you mute and unable to utter wishes or anything else.

I wish for lunch.

Granted: it eats you for lunch.

I wish I had some paper and pencil so i could tell my gene a wish.

Granted, but the genie can't read

I wish for a Pony!

Granted: but its an MLP and i promptly shot it in the head with a 50. cal

I wish my gene could read.

It has no reading material inside your body, so it gets bored to death. Literally.

I wish that I had fluffier hair.

Granted: your hair becomes so fluffy that when the wind blows you fly in to the air.

I wish for an extra life.

Granted, your extra life is as a slave in the far past.

I wish for 8 bit songs to happen in real life

Granted. People all over the world get angry when their violins don't need to be tuned. Also someone started playing boss music, and a world-eating skyscraper sized worm starts attacking.

I wish for Scout saiyan to turn into the F2P gibus scout

Granted, but the entire enemy team becomes pyros with phlogs.

I wish for a cake with a tester who tests for poison.

Your cake is explosive. It has edible explosives in it, so the tester does not mention them. I hope you don't mind loosing all your limbs.

I wish the Elite: Dangerous standard beta phase would begin right now.

Granted. Oh look, it found a partnership with EA!

I wish for moar plastic bags to play with.

Granted. You suffocates when you play with a plastic bag with narrow opening.

I wish the next poster wishes nothing.

Granted.

UNEXPECTED LEFT TURN!

I wish my body is 100% efficient, and used whatever it eats. (I never have to use the bathroom again!)

Edited July 19, 2014 by Souper

Granted, but the government has some words with you...

I wish I would finish Fallout Equestria: Heroes.

Granted. You finish it in 90 years (God, those Fallout: Equestria fanfics are LONG).

I wish I could meet Doug Walker (AKA ThatGuyWithTheGlasses).

Granted, but you only meet his mind which is merged into a supercomputer, and many of his memories are wiped.

I wish I could do at least half the contracts I take in my new career save.

Granted, however there are now only 2 contracts: Die horribly, and Die horribly. You do the first one.

I don't wish for anything. Instead, i backstab the below user before they finish reading this. I love being a spy.

Granted. A Pyro gets you afterwards

I wish for a baked potato, that gives me eternal life, a kickass immune-system and awesome hair. Because reasons.

Granted. Halfway through eating your magic potato, you are struck by a meteorite that leaves nothing but a crater and a few awesome locks.

I wish for the next poster's wish to not be corrupted.

Granted-

I wish this was post #7347, and I had some french fries.

Granted. Terrorists put anthorax into the fries, killing you.

I wish for more creepypastas of KSP.

Granted. They turn out to be true, and a demon rips your eyes out, and causes you to tear out your own internal organs.

I wish I was an invincible astronaut.

Granted. You are thrown into the sun and condemned to endure the excruciating pain forever.

I don't want to be so scared of going to Duna.
